reason.raw: Declining because parts of this PR have been split into others, and the eventual fix for #1564 will have to be rewritten to use those PRss
reason.html: Declining because parts of this PR have been split into others, and the eventual fix for #1564 will have to be rewritten to use those PRss

description.raw:
Fixed half of #1564. The CPU RaySensor seeing through close objects is fixed. It's probably easier to review each commit individually.

The parent of the sensor is set to not collide during range measurements. Rays are then cast from the origin of the sensor, and values less than minimum range are set to -inf afterwards.

If the physics engine does not support collision masks, the RaySensor falls back to previous strategy that has issue #1564. This only affects simbody, once #867 is fixed anyeays 

To physics::Collision added

* GetCategoryBits()
* GetCollisionBits()
* SupportsCategoryBits()
* SupportsCollisionBits()


Fixed LaserVisual -inf being displayed as +inf
description.html:
Fixed half of #1564. The CPU RaySensor seeing through close objects is fixed. It's probably easier to review each commit individually.

The parent of the sensor is set to not collide during range measurements. Rays are then cast from the origin of the sensor, and values less than minimum range are set to -inf afterwards.

If the physics engine does not support collision masks, the RaySensor falls back to previous strategy that has issue #1564. This only affects simbody, once #867 is fixed anyeays

To physics::Collision added

  • GetCategoryBits()
  • GetCollisionBits()
  • SupportsCategoryBits()
  • SupportsCollisionBits()

Fixed LaserVisual -inf being displayed as +inf
